name: Spectral (itch) (Carré, Croustille)
description:
Clarice has to find her way in this nightmarish place before the dark consumes her.

Controls

Movements: W,A,S,D,

Interactions: Spacebar

We, @Carré and @Croustille really enjoy good horror stuff so there we are, making our first horror game and first game jam ever!

We did this for the Brackeys Game Jam  2022_1, the theme was ''It is not real''.

Music Credits: Socapex - Dark Ambiance by Philippe Groarke.
